content.body: Well, it'd be weird not to set it to "worker" for the worker fetch. The worker script graph is part of the original worker fetching; we think of the worker itself and its static imports as really all one big thing, all of which are destined to compose the worker.
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: Well, it'd be weird not to set it to "worker" for the worker fetch. The worker script graph is part of the original worker fetching; we think of the worker itself and its static imports as really all one big thing, all of which are destined to compose the worker.

content.body: After that, imports of scripts into the worker being "script" makes sense to me. That's what importScript()s has always done, for example.
